content.text: Hi! I'm from Mexico. What's your favorite thing about your country?
I'm from the United States, but I love to travel to Europe. I'm planning a trip to Italy next year!
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Europe. What are you looking forward to seeing the most?
I'm really excited to see the Colosseum in Rome and the Eiffel Tower in Paris. I'm also excited to try all the different food!
I'm sure the food will be delicious! I love Italian food.
Me too! I'm especially excited to try the pizza.
Have you ever been on a cruise ship?
No, I've never been on a cruise ship. I've always wanted to go on one, but I've never had the time or money.
They're really fun! I went on one to the Caribbean a few years ago and it was an amazing experience.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'll have to put a cruise ship on my bucket list.
You should! I'm sure you'd love it.
Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go shopping on weekends. I'm also a big fan of dance lessons. I go to dance lessons with my boyfriend.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to take dance lessons.
You should! It's a great way to stay in shape and have some fun.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher. I teach English to middle school students.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always thought about being a teacher.
It is! I love working with kids.
Me too! I think it's so important to help kids learn and grow.
I agree! I love being a part of their lives and helping them to succeed.
